ygData.subject: Battle at the Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: (Firefox, I am aware of the safety measures that took effect.  Be aware that the main console of the bridge was blown apart and made useless before the first

Subject: Battle at the Cybertronian Fire
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Firefox, I am aware of the safety measures that took effect.  Be aware that 
the main console of the bridge was blown apart and made useless before the 
first time the CF's shields dropped)

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Beeline/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Firestarter/Unitron:



Dark One barrel rolled, avoiding all the attacks against him.  He saw an 
intact EMP cannon on the CF and fired off 25 rapid blasts frome his nosecone, 
launching two missiles down at the CF itself.

A thought popped into his neurological circuitry.  He opened up a comm. link 
to Iron Raptor.

"Maximal leader.  I have a proposition.  I will release this pathetic Maximal 
if you relenquish all prisoners from your brig into our custody and allow all 
our forces inside your ship to leave without being shot at.  Then the 
Alliance forces shall withdraw.  Either this, or we shall continue to pummel 
you into submission.  I suggest you take my offer."
---

Breakdown jumped out of the way of most of the shots including the photon 
charges, the few that him didn't damage him that much to his thick armor.  He 
fired off a grenade from his launcher at Highbrow and a sonic arc blast from 
his sonic blaster at Chromedome.

---

Pyro was still being pushed, now five feet under the muddy ground.

---

Hiss ducked down, a dozen crystal shards cutting at his armor.  He fired off 
five rapid optic blasts at Hardhead and four fusion blasts from his cannon at 
Highbrow.  He let out a curse as the freezing vapors struck, the robot 
increasing his internal temperature by ten degrees F.

---

Scavenger swerves hard left, avoiding the acid but weapons fire from 
Streetwise struck his hood.  He fired off another fifty armor-piercing 
rounds, this time at Brainstorm, 

---

Hot Spot continued with his assault on Pryo.

---

Groove fired off another burst of freezing mist, this one at Scavenger.

---

Blades continued crawling, his wounds getting more severe as he dragged them 
on the ground.  He was nearing First Aid, but didn't notice Nemesis Enforcer.

---

First Aid layed on his back still in stasis lock.

---

Streetwise jumped down from various shots, hitting his chest hard.

===

Demon Wulf growled, transforming ot his biped mode, swinging his sword, 
firing a blade missile at the CF.  

He let out a howl, followed by a horse laugh, pointing a clawed finger at IR.

"You will not live to see the end of your pathetic craft!"

===

Flesh Ripper formed a blue orb of energy in his left palm, throwing it at the 
CF, the orb being just a little stronger than the grenade.  He fied three 
fire balls from his mouth soon after.

---

Dark Claw formed one black orb in his left palm, throwing the energy orb that 
is as powerful as a few charges at the CF.  He formed a whitish-yellow orb, 
throwin it at the CF, the orb of energy having the affects of an EMP blast.

Dark Claw laughed, his energy was extensive.

===

Beeline the cyberbee dive bombed, firing off four optic blasts and 
intercepting four missiles.

---

Double Punch watched as the missiles heading for him were intercepted by 
laser fire.  He raised his tail, firing a spray of acid.  He watched as the 
shots and all but one shell were intercepted.  The shell struck him, and he 
laughed.

He raised his left pincher, firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles 
at Torca, tow of the same type from the other pincher at Sky Lynx.

---

Manterror was struck by numerous blasts, sending him crashing to the ground, 
not moving.

---

Injector flew up, avoiding the missile heading for him.  He raised his 
thorax, firing off two stinger missiles at Sideswipe.  He fired three optic 
blast from his insect optic sensors at Ratchet.

---

Bumblebee flew hard left, the missile missing him as well as 12 of the shots 
intended for him, the rest knocking him back half a foot.  He raised both 
arms, firing two stinger missiles from both launchers, two at Torca, two at 
Sideswipe.

---

Sixshot watched as the missile heading for him was intercepted by an optic 
blast.  He rolled, three shells digging into his left shin, mech-fluid 
leaking.

He raised boht weapons, firing off four hypersonic blasts at Sky Lynx from 
his left blaster, and four of the same kind at Sideswipe from the other.

---

Ares fired off two optic blasts at the incoming shells, two knocking him back 
a few feet as they went off against his chest plate.

He raised his grenade launcher, firing a grenade at Torca.

---

Sun Crusher dodged the missile by flying fast, eight shots sending him 
twisting through the air.  He raised his rifle as he balanced out and 
switched it to automatic fire, 20 laser bolts lancing out at Torca.

---

Reflector was struck by four shells, two in the left shoulder, two in the 
abdomen.  He cursed as his armor was cut through.  He fired off four laser 
bolts from his rifle at Tavatron.  He then fired ten rapid optic blasts at 
Sky Lynx.

===

Minion pulled hard left in his jeep, the missile missing but shrapnel cut 
into his front right light, breaking it apart.

He fired off twenty-four armor-piercing rounds at Sky Lynx, 12 from each 
cannon.

---

Chaos fired four five-foot long missiles at the CF, one from all four of his 
missile tubes in his missile truck mode.  -Have to keep a good portion of my 
missiles-

===

Nemesis continued crawling, spotting Blades.  He sped up his speed at 
crawling.

===

Scattershot flew through the air, looking at the CF and the slaggin shields 
that had came back online.  He raised his right arm, firing off 25 explosive 
shells at the CF.

Raising his left arm, a missile launcher appeared from subspace.  He fired 
off a rocket from the weapon of war at port side of the CF.

===

Firestarter continued flying, firing off two rockets from both wrist 
launchers, the four missiles heading for the bridge door that had been locked 
down.

---

Vehement sighed.  These heathens were irritating.  He turned around, raising 
both arms.  With the left barrel that made up most of his arm launched a 
missile, followed by another, heading for the armored computers.  

He turned his attention to the hole in the CF from whence he came, firing off 
two missiles at the hole, knowing his missiles would strike the shields if 
left alone.

---

Unitron raised his laser rifle, firing off four bolts at the sealed door, 
followed by a single optic blast.

Meanwhile, in the main entry door of the CF, in its exact middle, the horn 
missiles continued sending out a shock wave of sonic energy to weaken the 
stability of the metal around it.
